snippet: Religious leaders who espouse exclusionary policy toward gays should expect their congregations to continue thinning out.
abstract: Editorial condemns memo issued by Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints instructing church's leaders to consider people in same-sex marriages to be apostates and to banish their children; holds jarring guidance, particularly in its exclusion of children, is alienating members and perpetuating harmful stereotypes.
lead_paragraph: Religious leaders who espouse exclusionary policy toward gays should expect their congregations to continue thinning out.
